text: Didier Vanoverschelde (born 5 April 1952) is a former French racing cyclist. He rode in five editions of the Tour de France between 1979 and 1983. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Nord (French department) Category:French male cyclists Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:French people of Flemish descent
title: Didier Vanoverschelde
